title: [Large-Scale] Digital Simulation-Based Training for Enhancing Medical Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of healthcare systems and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing situational response and decision-making capabilities using digital technology for medical administrators/leaders within enterprises.

learning_goals: In medical crisis scenarios, learners can perform appropriate decision-making with over 90% accuracy using VR simulations.
Through digital learning tools, team leadership competencies are assessed, with over 80% of participants receiving positive evaluations in peer feedback
Applying simulation-based learning outcomes to real work environments improves work efficiency by 20% within three months
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
